title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' package in 'jdt.ui3', the selected package 'xxx' is not being copied correctly to the destination. As a result, the destination package 'xx' contains a package named 'ui', which is unexpected. The expected behavior is that the destination package should be named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: The destination package 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: The destination package should be named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
